text: (maranayata pat vu) ovun (sohon valin) pitamam vi (tama deviyan) idiriyata pæmina sita ganna dinadi, ovunge kisima karanavak allahta sangava tabannata næta. “rajyaya ada ka hata nam ayitida?”yi (vimasanu læba, eyata pilituru vasayen “siyallanvama) yatahat pahat kara palanaya karanna vana allahtama ayitiya!” (yayi kiyanu læbe)
